description:
Crunchy, sweet, and delicious. Each bite is a textural journey, through the snap of roasted almonds and hazelnuts, to crackle of toasted rice and quinoa crisps, all held together with rich dark chocolate and smooth caramel. But that’s not the best part of Chic Choc Chocolate Caramel bites, the best part is they’re yummy.

  • Ingredients: 62% cocoa dark chocolate*ft (chocolate liquor*, cane sugar*, cocoa butter*, soy lecithin*, vanilla extract*), sugars (coconut sugar*, caramel [cane sugar*ft, water, vinegar*], cane sugar*ft, brown rice syrup*), sunflower seeds*, toasted puffed rice*, almonds*, hazelnuts*, puffed quinoa*, Arabic gum*, sesame seeds*, coconut flakes*, sea salt. *Organic
  • Allergens: may contain: Brazil nuts, cashews, hazelnuts, pecans, pistachios, walnuts, sesame, milk
  • Prana is Montreal based family business committed to making healthy and delicious snacks, with low impact. When possible, Prana Organics uses locally sourced organic ingredients. When they can’t find what they need nearby, Prana Organics ensure the farmers they work with use sustainable farming practices and have fair working environments
name: Prana Organic Chic Choc Choco Caramel
